bike.description: Specialized Amira FACT 8r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact women's race geometry

components.description: Amira FACT carbon monocoque, 1 1/8 - 1 3/8" tapered steerer
1 1/8 - 1 3/8" Aheadset stainless balls w/ top cap, 20mm cone spacer, 20mm flat spacers
Specialized Pro-Set, 3D forged 7050 aluminum, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Specialized S-Wrap, cork ribbon w/ 2.5 gel pads
Silver cage/black body, w/ black toe clips and strap
Specialized Mondo Pro II, 700x23c, aramid bead, 120TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Specialized Mondo Pro II, 700x23c, aramid bead, 120TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Body Geometry women's Jett w/ Hollow Cr-Mo rails
Specialized Expert, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, aluminum head, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
